content.detailedDescription:
First night at campsite at three points arizona.  the visibility was exceptionally clear. as i was looking at the stars, i noticed one that was moving side to side in a fast and eratic motion. i then observed approximately 8 other bright starlike objects making similar moves, side to side, up and down and zig zag motions. all of the objects i observed were completely silent.  while one of the ufos remained stationary, i looked through my binoculars and could see that they were round and had red and white lights rotating around the the edge of them.  at approximately 12:45am i then observed large v shaped object moving in a northerly direction. this object was at least a half mile in length from the apex of the v to the end sides. it also moved in complete silence and then, i observed approximately 30 red colored round shapes exit from the apex of the triangle and form a line over a mile long directly in front of the triangle.  the triangle had two rows of white light on each side of it.
the red line of red ball shaped objects had the ends of the line in about 45 degree angles.  both v shaped ufo and red lined ufos made a coordinated turnd to the west moving at a slow speed. then the v shaped object just disappeared and the red ball objects continued to move in a westerly direction. on the nights of apri 5th and 6th i observed the same starlike objects making the same movements. as an ex-pilot and retired police officer, i am certain that these objects were not conventional aircraft.
on apri the 7th while returning to oklahoma and traveling east on interstate 40 one of these star like objects stayed to the south of us following us for over an hour.  i was able to see very bright white lighted orbs at ground level moving in eratic motions around houses and in some of the tree lines that were less than a mile from the highway. i have a theory as to exactly what it was i saw, but i will only speak to a mufon investigator on that subject.
content.summary: Observed 8 to 10 ufos each night for three consecutive nights.

content.detailedDescription: At around 11:00 pm i went outside to smoke, right over our house was a triangalur object with large steady bright lights on each point and a smaller red flashing light in the middle. it had white/grey "panels" in between the lights it was tree top level or house top level as i could plainly see the bottom of it. it was quite, but i heard what i believe were jets but i couldn't see them as they were over the clouds and this object was way below the clouds. i watched it as i smoked, i was not afraid, surprised you bet. it began to slowly, very slowly move in a norhernly direction. i went in the house. at first i thougt it may be some kind of new military aircraft, the next day i watched ufo files and it was the exactly the same as the pictures of ufo's seen in belgium, then i about jumped out of my chair and wished i had thought of taking it's picture.
content.summary: Triangle, bright lights on each point, smaller red flashing light in middle. white/grey panels in between lights

content.detailedDescription: My mother and me were walkingdown randall ave in weymouth. then my mom says"do you see that' i did see it i was in awe and speechless. they seemed to stand still and there movements were amazing. it made me a believer in u f o  sincerly gregory pope
content.summary: This item moved up in a controlled manner then went left it stoped and shot of at a

content.detailedDescription: I was driving alone, heading north on i-15 from victorville to barstow at appx. 7:00 pm. a few min. after crossing the mojave river i noticed two lights to the west of quartzite mountain. they were pink in color. quartzite mountain has several radio/transmission towers on its summit but these lights were too far to the west and too high to be on the mountain. the light on the right was higher than the one on the left. after only a few seconds the left light dissapeared then the right dissapeared as well. this got my attention and i kept glancing back at the mountain as i passed it. the mountain was on my left. when the mountain was at my 8:00 a bright flash went vertically straight down. it began above the elevation of the mountain and passed in front of it. it had the appearance of a shooting star, but 1. it passed in front of the mountain and 2. it was overcast to the west. involuntarily, i said to my self, "something is going on." no kidding, sherlock. not more than a few min. later, i saw a bright light above the horizon to the west. it was a white light with a red light on the bottom. both lights were solid. the object would dissapear and then instantly reappear several miles down the road to the north-west, still above the horizon. it dissapeared then reappeared three times. after the third time the activity stopped. all this occured between the stoddard wells exit and the hodge road exit on i-15. i have seen some interesting things since moving to the mojave desert two years ago from pennsylvania, but this event takes the cake. i can't explain it but when i saw the first two lights i knew they were not "normal". no aircraft i know uses pink id lights, nor do they dissapear and reappear in an instant many miles from where they were a moment ago. i am a teacher, and a pretty cool customer (i teach middle school!), but for the rest of the night i was pretty shaken up about what i saw. i know i couldn't have been the only person on i-15 that saw what i saw that night. i hope someone else will come foward with this experience too.
content.summary: Lights around quartzite mountain, victorville ca

content.detailedDescription: My mother and me were walkingdown randall ave in weymouth. then my mom says"do you see that' i did see it i was in awe and speechless. they seemed to stand still and there movements were amazing. it made me a believer in u f o  sincerly gregory pope
content.summary: This item moved up in a controlled manner then went left it stoped and shot of at a

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in my front yard to watch the iss flyover on 4/10/08. the iss appeared in the nnw sky at 9:14pm, was very bright, passed overhead and faded out at 9:16 pm aprox. aprox 2 minutes later i noted a trangular object approaching from the north, it was oriented with the tip of the triagle to the front and the base to the rear. the tips of the triagle were dimly lit with striated lights. the lights were silver in color with black stripes, and filled each corner equally such that they were also triangular in shape. the color of the object was flat black, it was light absorbing, dull in nature. i could not hear any noise from the vehicle. it passed directly over my head, headed southward toward
mather afb (?). the object faded out of view at about the 1 oclock position of the horizon (if the horizons were at 9pm and 3 pm respectively.  the object/craft flew in a straight line, and maintained the same altitude through out my observation. my impression was that it was traveling at a slow rate of speed, somewhat like an approach to the landing field.
my house is situated in the flight path of mather afb. numerous aircraft from ups other cargo carriers use mather for a buismess hub.  we also frequenly see aircraft from beale afb in the flight pattern (t38, c5a) as they use mather as part of the touch and go training. i wonder if this was a miliatry fly over? night training? but it did not feel like a standard af type plane. also, there was no, absolutely no noise from this object or configuration of landing lights or operational lights. virtually no lights at all except for the faintly glowing courners of the craft.  my other suspicious would be some type of stealth prototype or maybe even a drone aircraft.  i would love to know if any other reports come in, with the iss flyover and subdued moonlight  it was a good amateur astronomy night. hopefully someone else saw what i did and will report it.
thanks.
content.summary: Triangular object, traveling north to south at 12 oclock position in sky, no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my bedroom eating breakfast, it was about 7:40 am.  my window blinds were drawn.  suddenly a bright flash lit up my room.  i've never seen anything like it before.  i thought it might have been a reflection off of a car, but i didn't hear a car.  (i hear every car that goes by my house because my bedroom is close to the road.)  the flash only lasted about half a second.  it was bright like sunlight.  my window faces north.  the light somehow filled every corner of my room and shone straight in.  i have no idea what this could have been.
content.summary: I saw a bright flash of light.

content.detailedDescription: Okay first off i live in norhern ca. in the mountains. i star gaze all the time and know the flight patterns for my area. last night my husband noticed a very bright white/yellow moving star.(iknow venus, and this was not venus)it made an eliptical orbit.(kinda like a j) then... it turned into a plane!! i'm not kidding we were watching through binoculars and all the lights dimmed when my husband screamed "it's shifting" in the next momemt all we saw was something resembling a standard aircraft. very strange. there was no sound and it was not a flight pattern used before.
content.summary: Bright light morphing into plane!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I was setting up a telesope just after sunset. moon was a waxing cresent in the southwest and stars were just becoming visible.
i looked up to the zenith at the brightest star, vega with my naked eye to begin a new observation. i noticed a movement in the due northern area and quickly spotted two blue-ish small spherical objects at very high altitude or  low orbit.
appearance was dimmer than the vega, almost a reflective quality softened by distance.
the object sizes were identical, small orbs about the 3x the apparent size of vega.
movement was due north to due south, one behind the other in identical tracking motion and tandem. the distance between these objects was 4 degrees.
speed was approximately 2-3x faster than a satellite or high altitude aircraft.
duration was 10-12 seconds, disappearing in the south about 25 degrees above the horizon.
 **note: 9/19/07 the following night at the same time i obseved a boomerang craft in exact same trajectory moving north to south but much faster.
object was much larger, appearing about thumbnail sized with definite curved edges of wingtips and corners. object appeared reflective , casting ruddy color from high altitude light colors above the now darkening twilight of the evening sky.
i estimate this object to be 20 times larger than any  large military aircraft i am familiar with. possibly much larger, as it appeared to be in a high altitude orbit, well above the cirrus 
speed was very, very fast. traversed the sky in about 7 seconds.
appeared about 25 degrees above northern horizon, and disappeared about 40 degrees above southern horizon.

newscast on following tuesday by weatherman larry sprinkle reported seeing a similar object in charlotte nc, and showed photo on tv broadcast during daytime hours. local nbc channel 36/cable channel 6.
email request for information from tv studio recieved no reply. no information on their website.
content.summary: Two spheres in tandem

content.detailedDescription:
Also viewed by friend in broward county from "high" in the sky to beyond her horizion. broward county city tamarac apx 35 miles from me in palm beach at the same time. mine view was colored by the atmosphere as hers was not.

1. me..Sitting on portch with my cat..Friend walking her dog...We r both early risers.
2.  bright light out of nowhere...I am alsays looking at the sky.
3.  wow!!!! what was that? no sound. if it came through clouds...No other clouds were visible...It was traveling in s direction other than the light was shining...Not a helocopter...Not a plane...The biggest and the brightest shooting star i have ever seen!
content.summary: Bright "shooting star" in southern sky falling at a 30 degree angle beyond my horizion.

content.detailedDescription:
I was comming back from mexico  flyng from huston to tampa maybe after about 20 minutes of depart i was talking with a person next to me to the right and to my left was my sister she was at the window the person next to me all of a sudden he notice this 4 things flyng besides the plane he said what is that are those parashutes we look and i see four whiteround
things flyng at diferent distances and hights i stand up and put my face on the window to have a better look i focus on one of theme and it looks like big round thing surranded by an energy field like i still was tring to figure out what i was looking at ,thene i look down below the engine i saw something very well define it was like a cilinder ,octagonal like it was metal not shiny it was flyng very close to the engine i saw it very clear thene  i relize that i was looking at a ufo i jump back to my sit very exited the guy next to me asked me what i saw ,i said to him do you belive in ? he said no and i said well that is what was out there he got a little scare and laid on his seat , my sister saw everything and she was very confuse, she was very quiet looking out tring to find explanations of course inside her parameters, i relize this experiance is a big one because confirm your belive, and im very positive that this experiance was for me i can explain why ,well i hope by sharing this other people confirm this reality.
content.summary: Flyng from huston to tampa saw 4 round white things flyng besides plane a ship was below engine flyng very close

content.detailedDescription: I was twelve years old and my family was on vacation at holden beach, north carolina between mid july or mid august 1977. we were out on a dock crabbing around 10 at night and i was looking up at all the stars because this beach wasn't built up at all and i was astounded by all the stars...I'd never seen a sky like that. i then noticed one moving a rather quick pace. i thought it might be a meteor or a shooting star but it was white like the other stars and moving a lot slower. it wasn't falling from the sky it was moving straight across it. it was way to high to be an airplane...I have seen meteor showers and the space station pass by...This was smaller and moving at a good clip. it was then i noticed another sphere coming towards it from the opposite direction. they both slowed as they got closer to each other. i excitedly told my family what i was seeing and was ignored by everyone except my sister. i was holding a flashlight and i shined the beam up to show her where to stare...I didn't look away because i never would have found them again if i'd looked anywhere else. my eyes were getting strained from not blinking and my sister had started to doubt me when suddenly the merged spheres shot away from each other in the directions they had just come from. she gasped when she saw it. these things streaked across the sky. the space station moves across the sky like a vw bug compared to these things! they were a streak and gone. i was scared because i couldn't explain it. it also excited me, i couldn't believe what i was seeing..I've never seen anything like it in the sky since. after all thse years it's still burned on my brain...My sister sadly acts like she never saw it...She's very afraid of being ridiculed.
content.summary: White spheres at beach

content.detailedDescription: I was mowing a large yard and as it is so large i usually get bored and look up at passing planes and birds. the yard has an unobstructed view of the sky. it was the 11 o' clock hour, around 11:30 when i looked up to watch a couple of hawks riding on thermals. it was then i noticed up much higher, perhaps around 500 or 600 ft. a black object standing still in place. i was rattling around on the riding mower so at first i dismissed it, but when i completed another circuit around the yard and the object was still there i stopped the mower. it was black, cigar-shaped and stock still. at first i thought, what a stupid bird, it can't see prey from that height, but then i realized it was larger...From that height i'd say around 15 ft. long. what grabbed my attention  was that it was no plane...There were no wings..No noise and whereas the two birds far below rocked and swayed on the slight breeze this object never moved. it was at an odd angle as well. it wasn't horizontal or vertical it was tilted at a 45* angle. i watched for a few minutes. i remember chuckling to myself that if it was some sort of craft that if they were watching me they must think what a waste of time it was for me to mindlessly go round and round on that machine.The day was partly cloudy, so the sun would peek out and then go behind hazy high clouds. i observed that even when the sun hit the object there was no shine to it, as you would expect with metal. it was so odd and then, as i looked from the ground to it's position, to try to figure out how high it was it was gone. i saw no movement, it just vanished. i would have posted this before now but i was anxious to see if someone else would post something. odd. odd. i only told my husband about it, and that was after thinking about it for a day.I will also go ahead and post a strange sighting i had as a little girl while i'm here.
content.summary: Black cigar shape

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking up stairs from our lower patio to the upper balcony with my wife when i hear my sons voice yell a long drawn out "oh!" followed by "what the fuck is that!" (i didnt know my son was out on the balcony and he didnt know we were on the stairs). my wife and i immediately rush up the stairs and onto the balcony, my son is pointing out into the sky saying "what is that!", "look at that!", i look where he is pointing and see absolutly nothing. i had a hundred different sickening thoughts at that moment about what could be going on with my son and what could be causing him to see things and then i see what he's pointing at, right in front of my face, about three hundred yards out, a flying metal ball becomes apparent as it crosses from a back drop of white cloud to grey cloud (my son says he first noticed it as it crossed from a backdrop of blue sky to white cloud). it was a highly reflective metal orb. once i saw it cross from white to grey the shape and the detail of what it was became perfectly apparent it was a perfectly round , perfectly reflective flying metal ball. the ball seemed to move slowly and began to grow bigger for a very brief moment and then it rolled and began moving across the sky in a north east direction until it moved behind a tree and was gone. 
i felt surprisingly unsurprised by it. for some reason it seemed almost normal it wasnt magical and it wasnt like somthing out of a movie. once i could see it i understood it completely. it was a sphere, it was flying and it was disguising itself by reflecting the surrounding sky i also immediately understood that there is most likely plenty of them out there all of the time
content.summary: A reflective metal sphere flies in our direction and then changes direction and crosses the sky in front of us

content.detailedDescription:
I submitted a report monday night i think. i had seen a ufo . i am a security guard at a rest stop along i95 in martin county florida. there is an old rest stop behind the new one where i go each night to stretch my legs occasionally. 
                           for the past 3 nights i have seen these objects they have the appearance of satellites. each night there has been one. tonight i saw three. they come from different directions each night. tonight i saw one from sw to ne at 2052. then one from w to e at 2101. then another from n to s at 2104 . these objects have no strobe lights at all, they move through the sky similar to a satellite, with no noise. 
                     but right before they dissapear they power up. they become considerably brighter and slow down. then in each case they disapear shortly after powering up almost as if they are engaging some sort of cloaking device. i have kept a record of dates, times and directions. 
                      also as i have mentioned in my last email. there are alot of chemtrails being sprayed in my area. i dont know if this has anything to do with the ufos i have kept a record of dates when the chemtrails are sprayed. they come over with their red and white planes and spray in the typical x patterns and tic tac toe patterns.
                             i am in the florida national guard. this past weekend was drill weekend in ft pierce. well, at the start of drill 0730 the sky was being filled with these chemtrails. x's everywhere. i think they know when drill weekend is. i believe we are being poisoned .
                      i am off tomorrow and sat. but i am back to work sun. i have an expensive telescope i plan to take back there some night. mabey sat.........Daniel kime
content.summary: Nightly occurance for 4 nights

content.detailedDescription: On monday evening (04/07/08), around 7:55 p.M., my son, my daughter-in-law, and myself, were outside my home when we looked up to the sky, looking  north to north east, and notice what we taught was a star.  the sun hadn't gone down yet, so i knew that it was to early for the stars to be out.  looking at the star, was like looking at a welders arc.  it was about -2. in magnitude.  we looked around to see if they were any others stars out, but we couldn't see any.  the object never flicker like the stars do, nor did it move from it's position.  what really fascinated me about the star was it brightness.  i've never seen a star that bright.  after about fifteen minutes, the star disappear. i looked at my star chart for that evening, and the only star that would of been in that area was arcturus,but it wouldn't be in that area until around 9:00 p.M.
content.summary: On the 04/07/08, around 7:55 pm, my son, his wife, and my self,  were outside looking north to see when the cold front was gonna come when my son notice a bright looking star northnortheast .  the object was to bright to be a star, plus it was still early

content.detailedDescription: Walking the dog in the park i saw a black object in the sky thinking at first it was a flag i never saw before and thought oh well,continued through the park and thought wait it 's not wher it was before  it's further along the boston skyline than it was before planes went by it this whole thing took place in west roxbury the object seemed to also change from black to white to grey i hope i'am not the only person who saw this,i left thinking ok nobody else seems to notice this
content.summary: Black flag

content.detailedDescription: Story is too long.  it's very convincing and other family members can verify what happened that night too.  i'm thinking about writing a book.  it's very interesting and true. but wanted this to go on the record that grissom had alot of ufo activity in 1993/1994 and i haven't seen anything reported on it.
content.summary: i awoke, ufo in front yard, i was shot with a lazer beam through front window, phyiscal effects prove it was no dream.

content.detailedDescription:
03/06/2008 6:30pm approximately heard a set of fighter jets take off in a hurry, a few minutes later another set of fighter jets took off, made a note of this because i love to hear and watch the jets, i always say "go get em boys" and "be safe" and they make a very distinct sound when flying

7:00pm kept hearing them fly over

7:30pm after hearing the jets constantly flying over went outside, watched them for a bit making a large oval patterns
2 fighter jets flying in formation in a large oval north and south direction 700-1000 ft altitude
2 other fighter jets flying in formation in a large oval east and west direction 700-1000 ft altitude
both sets of jets flying in a counter-clockwise direction if looking up at them from the ground
used binoculars to look at the jets they had a blue lighted cockpit (not a bright light) watched for 30-45 minutes 
gut feeling was something is out of the ordinary that this just isn't right they do not fly training missions on a thursday night over a heavily populated area that low

8:00-8:15pm went back inside to help my wife put the boys in bed

8:45-9:00pm got dressed in heavier clothes (cold out that night) and went outside fighter jets are still flying at the same level same direction. nothing else in the sky at that altitude i did see jets at a very high altitude flying what looked to be a grid pattern 2 north to south with the red and blue marker lights and 15 minutes later 2 east to west with red blue marker lights( those could have been commercial jets not sure to high of an altitude to tell)
commercial aircraft were still going to the airport but they were staying west of town, had a scanner on to listen to aircraft and i did hear a pilot tell the tower "all we have seen is just a little light show tonight"

9:30-10:00pm in the middle of where the fighter jets were flying i saw bright white light like some one flipped a switch it was stationary for a split second before it shot up and out going out of the atmosphere in a sw direction at about 60 degrees there was a light trail behind it as it left it looked solid,holding your arms out it was about 6-8 inches 
i guess the best way to explain would be take one of those triangles from school face south hold your arms up and out at a 45 degree angle with the straight part of the triangle on the right side and the 60 degree angle on the left.
i almost fell off my deck when i saw this 
about 45 seconds later another object exact same thing from almost the exact same position just slightly more to the west and at about 4 inches up the trail of the other object that trail only lasted a split second but to give you an idea of the second object/lights position. the 2nd object/light took off up and out at a 30-40 degree angle in a sw direction also, again same thing face south use a triangle with the straight part on the right and the 30 degree angle on the left, up and out of the atmosphere

10:15-10:30pm fighter jets landed

not sure what i saw gut feeling like i said something was very different, not right, i do not belive that the fighter jets were flying a training mission over a heavily populated area, i do not belive that whatever those lights/objects were anything coming into the atmosphere, they  were goin out, i have seen plenty of falling stars that was not it, i do not belive that it was space junk coming into the atmosphere either. the light was bright like melted metal and bright white. that night it was clear and dark. as goofy as it sounds it reminded me of a craft going into warp drive.
content.summary: 4 f-15's flying in large oval formation 2 object take off after 3 hrs

content.detailedDescription: I had just got home. i parked my car in my driveway with the front of the vehicle facing the street. i live at the very top of a cultisac and right in the middle. also the street is on a hill. so im right at the top in the middle. i was smoking a cigarrette and listening to the radio, looking up at the sky like i like to do on occassion. a plane's flashing lights caught my eye and i watched it for a minute or to as it faded into the distance. it was to my right very high up and heading north. a bright light then caught my eye to my left. i looked at it and at first i thought it was either a car's headlights or a street lamp in the distance. but within a second from me initially seeing it; it began pulsating. at first i thought it had to be a plane. but when i looked up there were many planes in the sky but the're lights were flashing and had at least one that remained on at all times. this thing however was completely different. it wasn't flashing at all, no strobe effect. this thing was pulsating which was really weird. it's hard to explaing but it very gently got brighter then gradually got dimmer then would turn off completely then start up again. at first i thought it was a street lamp also because it appeared to be motionless. but as i watched it i notiched it was actually moving. it moved up and down left to right only about 5 feet at a time. then i realized i had my flashlight in my car so i grabbed it. the flashlight is pretty bright it puts out one million lumens. and this thing was not far at all. i know this was probably stupid but, i got the flashlight pointed it at the object and blinked it in unison with the objects pulsating lights. right when i did this, this thing stopped in it's tracks. i took this chance to run upstairs and get my camcorder. when i got upstairs my sister was still awake and so i yelled for her to see this thing throught the window. she was stunned when she saw the way it was moving and the way it was pulsating. we watched it for about a minute and a half until it was out of sight. i was determined to get this on video so i ran outside in the front to film  it but it was nowhere in sight. this thing was hardly moving. much slower then a person taking a stroll. yet in the 10 seconds it took for me to get outside. it completely vanished. after this me and my sister sat down and thought of possible explanations. we couldn't come up with anything. the weirdest part was that from it's distance i would say it was larger then a car but it wasn't making any noise whatsoever. also it was not very high either. only at around the height of a 4 or 5 story building! and like i said only half a block away. but came much closer to my house. it was spherical in shape. but i couldnt tell if that was the actual object or just the shape of the light. i couldnt see a definite shape. just this strange pulsating light which eventually made it's way almost right above my house. 10 minutes after me and my sister went to bed, we began hearing the neighborhood dogs barking very loudly i have 3 dogs and  the only way i can describe it is the type of bark they do when they are startled. this whole thing was really weird and the way it pulsated combined with the way it moved and the fact it made no noise was very eeire. i hope other people saw what i saw.
content.summary: I saw a pulsating sphere. about a half a city block away.Swaying towards my general location.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room with my friend listening to music (like always) and my dad was on the deck (like always) and he yelled "mackenzie! sabrinna! i just saw a ufo go over the lake! (we have a great veiw of the the lake chelan)" me and sabrinna hopped out my window(which goes strait onto the deck) me and sabrinna looked up into the sky, and there as a ufo flying away, we watched it for about 2-3 minutes and then it dissapeared into space! we were amazed to see it! we never thought that we would see one in our lives! we had wanted to see one forever! and we finally got to see one!
content.summary: A ufo passed right infront of my house!

content.detailedDescription: I was at my best friends house. me and mackenzie(my best friend) were cleaning her bedroom. mackenzie's bedroom window goes right onto the front deck. her dad, mike, was resting outside on the deck and enjoying the sunny day. he opened his eyes to look out at the lake, and he saw a white, oval shaped ufo. the ufo was flying fast over the water, a little over a few hundred feet up. it flew over the water, went over wapato point, and zig-zagged upward. it did this at a fast speed, in about 4 seconds. then mike yelled for me and mackenzie(my best friend) and we climbed out of her bedroom window, right onto the deck. while we were getting outside, the ufo was leaving. it started heading farther away from us, way high in the sky, about as high as an airplane, but it was going at a fast speed, faster than a plane. when it was far,far,far away in the sky, it did a couple of turns and a loop. when i saw the ufo, it kind of had like heat around it, like when you look at the heat coming out of a barbeque when you are cooking, the clear blurriness. we were watching the ufo get higher into the sky for awhile, maybe 40 seconds. but, it was getting high, and was going fast! mackenzie got the binoculars, but we could not find the ufo in the binoculars. then finally, the ufo disappeared! when i first saw the object, it was amazing, i noticed that it was not a plane, and mike told me what he seen it do and i knew that this object was a ufo. this was not an airplane, or bird, or anything like that. it wasnt even man-made. this was a ufo! experiencing this was amazing to all three of us! i hope i will see another ufo soon, and get a video, or atleast a picture of it!
content.summary: White, fast, and oval shaped

content.detailedDescription: My son was at home and he went outside to take the dogs out and noticed something very large and flaming coming down toward the earth.  he ran inside to get the camcorder and filmed this thing coming down.  it seemed like it was falling fast at first like a meteor but then it slowed almost to a stop but it appeared to be flaming the whole time.  he filmed it until it dropped down below the tree line of the house.  you can see that inside the flames there is something in there but we can't make out what it is other than something pretty large.  there was absolutely no smoke or any kind of trail behind it.  my son got the whole thing on film and it's a pretty good quality.  it was still light outside so you can see it and he filmed it until it dissapeared behind the tree line. it was moving so slow it was hard for me to tell it was still moving.  we were all just amazed and we kinda half wondered/kidded if there wouldn't be some kind of explosion or something as it made it's way down.  i'm sorry this camera is not digital and i don't know how to upload the video but i'd be happy to share it if i knew how.  i would like someone that might know something of this sort of thing to have a look at it if you have anyone that might be close by in our area.
content.summary: Very slow falling, flaming, glowing thing making no sound and no smoke trail

content.detailedDescription: I sent in a report just that my handheld did not allow me to answer other question so please contact me at my email
content.summary: Peviose submit a report

content.detailedDescription:
While driving home from laredo, tx to brownsville, tx on hwy 359 approx. 10-15 miles west of hebbronville at 2010 i saw what i believed to be a red light on top of a radio tower.  i then noticed it had had a small white strobe to the right of the red light and thought this was unusual since i drive this route every week and had never noticed a white strobe.  as i got closer, i noticed it was moving very slowly.  as i got closer yet, i noticed a feint blue light to the left of the red light.  the object passed over the highway in front of me at an altitude of approx. 200' at a very slow speed just immediately se of the jim hogg county airport over what i believe to be the gruy ranch entrance gate.  i could not make out a shape of the object, but because of the configuration of the lights, it appeared to be oblong.  i slowed down from a speed of 55mph to at least 15-20 mph as i passed the object now immediately to my left.  after i passed the object, it hovered stationary and displayed multiple (10-12) ultra-bright strobe lights.  i drove about a quarter mile further and pulled over to watch the strobes until they stopped at which time i looked at my watch which read 2020.  i fumbled with my camera-phone but was unable to get a picture as i was too late.  i then turned around to go look for the object as it was proximal to the airstrip and i thought if it was a helicopter i would surely see it at the airport.  it was at this point that i noticed none of the usual lights or search beacons were turned on at the airport and they hadn't been the whole time i passed the airstrip.  i turned into the airport on the main drive to see if i could see a helicopter.  there were no lights on except for the blue runway lights and i did not see any aircraft whatsoever except for a small parked plane.  i noticed a do-not-enter/private property sign on the drive and at this point i decided to continue on my way home with no further sighting.

border patrol helicopters are commonly seen in the area, but i heard no noise and have never seen any aircraft whatsoever put on such a light display.

the whole time i witnessed the object i had a surreal feeling and quite frankly felt excited and dumbfounded at what i saw.  

what was it???
content.summary: Large, red, non-blinking, slow-moving light seen at a distance of less than 200'

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to meet a friend whom was nearby and it was best for me to pull over into a gas station and wait for her. so i pulled into a gas station at about 10:45  the gas station is on the southeast corner of the intersection and i parked as close to the corner so she could spot me coming from the west. i was looking out for her (west) when i decided to take a glance high into the heavens, that's when i saw a very shiny object slowly moving from the north to the south.  it was very bright, like a flashlight. at first i thought it was a kite because their was something else near it, like a small blurry grey triangle shaped object.  then i thought it was a ballon with something attached. ufo fanatic and wanting to see something i never lost sight of it. that's when i was convinced it was neither!!!
    the object moved verry slow like i said from the north to the south then it stopped, it held its position for about two minutes then it moved east. the object moved verry slow like it was verry high i mean verry verry high!  then it stopped againg returning to it position and stood there for a couple more minutes. i tried not to blink and didn't. it never lost its brightness. that's when i said to myself "ufo". then the object began to move south then headed southeast. and then it began to get smaller and smaller at the sametime moving southeast. it got to a point were it was like the size of a pin head and still shining. then it just vanished. 

     i was speechless, first tought that came to my head was mufon so i got on my wireless internet and searched your number called and left a message, now i'm home typing away!!!  please notify me with any updates or other sightings that occured similar to mine. thank you!
content.summary: Bright white and elevated slowly from low to very high

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home with my daughter and we were in the driveway getting out of the car and were heading towards our house when my daughter looked up at the sky and told me that the object above our skyline was weird acting and was not acting like a plane should be flying...I laughed and looked up and told her it looked like a plane to me...She said that it was wobbling around like a top or something and not flying straight like planes do...She has seen her brother off many times at the airport, plus, we live in kokomo, and see lots of planes go towards grissom air reserve base, so she should know....She got upset and bothersome at me and told me to come towards her and look at the object from where she was standing...So i  moved more towards her way...I saw what appeared to be small engine type plane...Like a 4 to 2 seater,....But sure enough, it did have some red and green lights on it ...But it did appear to be gyrating or the having the wobbling top toy effect and was not flying straight at all...It appeared to be circular looking once i moved around in the back yard to try to set a better view of it...Then i noticed after awhile that it was not moving on out of the area like a regular plane would do...It kind of stayed in one area.(almost looking it was just moving back and forth in one spot)...It almost looked to me like it was even rotating and wobbling at the same time some once i stared at it for awhile.....I went inside the house and it was still around the area pretty much in the same spot where it started...Weird i thought....Decided to report it to your website...
content.summary: Object wobbling pretty much in one area over neighborhood sky

content.detailedDescription: Well,to start off, every weekday morning around 6 30 i stand outside my house waiting for the bus. i've always been interested in ufos and things like that since i was young, and recently i started taking it seriously, watching shows like ufo hunters and looking up stories and such. anyways on tuesday, february 5th, i was outside my house as usual, and noticed two very bright balls of light in the sky. they were pretty close to the ground. at the time i didn't think much of it, i dismissed it as an airplane or a star maybe. but on the next day, wednesday, february 6th i saw the same balls of light at the exact same location. they were just hovering there so i knew it couldnt be an airplane or a helicopter. they also didn't make any noise. now it couldve been a star, but in my opinion it was way too close and way too bright to be a star. i witnessed a couple of airplanes fly near the objects and then immediantly change course. so i now realized that this was something unusual and brought my cell phone out. i recorded almost a minute of footage. it is really bad quality,being taken by a cell phone, but you can still make out one of the balls of light a little bit. the second object can't be seen in the video because it is being blocked by a tree. i had to stop recording since my bus arrived and i lost sight of both objects. i saw these two objects at the same location for the next two days after that. on the last day, i attempted to keep sight of it while i was on the bus. to my amazement, it actually seemed to be gliding alongside the bus at a distance. as i got off the bus it was nearby behind a few trees. i turned to talk to my friend and when i turned back it had dissapeared. i have never seen anything like it. one thing i forgot to add is i did see these objects again, i don't remember excatly when, but they appeared to,not sure how to describe this, teleport in. as in,nothing was in the spot at first, and a second later there it was.I could just be overeacting of course, and what i saw those nights could easily be nothing more than something explainable, but for now i'm convinced that what i saw was something very unusual.
content.summary: I saw a bright, hovering objects outside of my home.

content.detailedDescription:
In the winter of 2004, on january 29 at 3:51 pm, mi wife and i were driving on a dirt road near the city of phelan, ca. i was in the passenger side with the window open, as i took random pictures of the desert landscape. we were traveling south, on anderson ranch rd at low speed, since the road was kind of rough. i did not notice anything until i downloaded the images to my laptop. a total of five pictures captured a bright teardrop or cigar shaped ufo of cylindrical shape. the object appeared on the first pictured at relatively low altitude, just over the san gabriel mountains to the south west. in the next four images, the object gained significant altitude, until the last picture, which shows the object at extremely high altitude. the last picture shows the object "flashing away" and leaving some sort of energy trail. i did not alter these five images in any way, and i have saved them on my computer as read-only, as to prevent any accidental changes. i used a sony cybershot digital camera to take the pictures. the images are available here, along with my own low-tech analysis: 

http://picasaweb.Google.Com/josediaz1111/seraphim

higher resolution images available upon request.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Cylinder,  Flash,  Teardrop
content.summary: Bright teardrop or cigar shaped ufo over california desert
